DOC.brief_summary: Chronic idiopathic urticaria (CIU) is a common form of chronic urticaria in which the cause is not detected after intensive clinical and laboratory investigation.In view of the current data, it was suggested that at least part of the patients with CIU have an autoimmune process.This study is designed to investigate the mechanisms involved in the regulation and activation of the immune cells in patients with CIU and corelate them with disease activity
DOC.brief_title: T Cell Function in Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria
DOC.criteria: age above 18 chronic urticaria age below 18 pregnancy other severe chronic diseases
